Drafts on Slow Data http://localhost:1313/drafts/ Recent content in Drafts on Slow Data Hugo en-us <<<<<<< HEAD Mon, 10 Nov 2025 02:47:29 +0100 ======= Sat, 29 Nov 2025 18:08:29 +0100 A fast Byte-Pair tokenizer for LLMs http://localhost:1313/drafts/byte_pair_encoding/ Sat, 29 Nov 2025 18:08:29 +0100 http://localhost:1313/drafts/byte_pair_encoding/

Fast and meaningful tokenization for LLMs

I’m currently taking a deep learning course and I have an assignement that’s basically: write a Google Trad/DeepL for French to English translation with minimal data (130k paired sentences) and training time (we need to make it trainable on a laptop). The goal of the assignment is to learn about modern LLMs architectures, specifically about attention and transformers, the deep learning part really. Naturally, this is not what I did: this blog post recounts my wanderings.

Consider the following matrix, with some entries unknown:

$$ M = \begin{pmatrix} ? & 2 & ? \\ 2 & 4 & ? \\ 3 & ? & 3 \end{pmatrix} $$
